name: Depth Charge (itch)
description:
Fall deep down into the ocean to attempt to destroy an enemy submarine nested at the bottom. Dodge mines, fish, and lurking creatures in this vertical scrolling underwater game.

WASD for movement.

E for Quick Restart.

Tools:

  • Unity 2.3.2 (C#)
  • Visual Studio
  • Photoshop Elements 2020
  • Premiere Elements 2020
